name: XMPro
tag_list: gartner-bpm-cool-vendor, ibpms, intelligent-business-operations, unstructured-process, business-process-management, business-process-management-software, sharepoint, process-improvement, process-optimisation
overview:
XMPro specialises in enterprise business process management with a range of innovative process management solutions that have a strong focus on process performance measurement and improvement.

XMPro has a passion for process and the ability to transform process management ideas into technology enabled process management solutions. We help you to Get Better at Getting Work Done.

We differentiate ourselves from other BPM companies by means of our innovative product, XMPro, that eliminates the frustration with conventional workflow products through our dynamic process solution.

XMPro is a rules-based Business Process Management Suite that supports dynamic, event-based processes as well as structured, workflowbased processes. It enables organisations to manage work activities throughout the processes lifecycle. XMPro addresses this in 3 components:

  • XMDesigner Visualises business processes to get an understanding
  • XMWorkspace - The processes are digitised for consistency and control
  • XMInsight - Processes are optimised to improve business outcomes

Our website, www.xmpro.com explains the three components and how they work together to provide your Business with the flexibility to constantly improve your processes without the relating cost and time constraints that are normally associated with software solution enhancements. The XMPro solution is in your hands. XMPro enables organisations to visualise, digitise and optimise sequential and dynamic processes in a single solution. It gives better control to IT, better outcomes for business and a better experience for end users.
